content.rendered:
Merchandiser – Woven & Denim

Job Context

Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) is a multinational apparel buying hub and exporter. The organization is marching ahead with a vision to deliver world-class service, quality solutions and value-added services to end products for the textile industries. DSL is committed to achieve global level, beginning from fabrics to fashion through market knowledge and experienced sourcing professionals. Global headquarter of Dongyi sourcing is located at North Point, Hong Kong and Global corporate office is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Dongyi Sourcing Ltd is searching potential candidates for Merchandiser – Woven & Denim position.

 

Job Responsibilities

  1. Communication with internal and external team

  2. Development Progress Chart, Buyer progress Chart

  3. Working for sampling & trims approval process

  4. Buying sample submission and arrange styling and trims approval comments

  5. Review monthly trend book & color palette

  6. Fabric sourcing based on mode book & send designer for selection

  7. Sharing sample requisition in ERP & getting sewing and sample submission plan

  8. Selected fabric booking & arrange on time inhouse to secure range build

  9. Follow-up for tech pack with designer based on fabric sourcing according to T&A

  10. Sourcing trims as per design pack

  11. Review Design pack with Technical team

  12. Review sample with relevant team before dispatch to customer

  13. Sample submission for selection meeting

  14. Fabric quality hanger submission and approval

  15. Doing costing with factory & cost confirmation from buyer

  16. OCS approval, Preparing File

  17. Risk Assessment meeting

  18. Getting sample, strike off & trims approval from customer

  19. Sales review meeting & action plan

  20. Production Planner

  21. Fabric Backing as per Planner

  22. Capacity Allocation with Planning Team

  23. Delivery Quotation with NUK & FTY

  24. New PCCR Sent to FTY with Agreed CP

  25. CP Tracking With FTY

  26. Sample Follow Up with Fty and DSL Team

  27. Shipment Follow Up With FTY

  28. Checking DSL System (Exception Dashboard)

  29. Issue solving

  30. Update Shipment Forecast

  31. Mail Communication with BO & FTY

  32. Production Progress with Factory, DSL Team, Buyer

  33. Share Exception Chart with GT & FT(DSL)

  34. Share Shipment Forecast with QA Team

  35. PI & PO Raised on System

  36. Any kind of instruction from our higher management

Employment Status

Full-time

 

Requirements:

  1. Graduation from any reputed university on Textile subject.

  2. Strong knowledge on Merchandise Manager – Jersey, regulations, and industry standards.

  3. 10-15 years working experience from both factory & any reputed buying house.

  4. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for detail.

  5. Demonstrated leadership and team management abilities.

  6. Effective communication and presentation skills.

  7. English written & spoken are mandatory.

Educational Requirements

  • Textile Graduated from a renowned University

 

Experience Requirements

  • At least 5 years

  • The applicants should have experience in the following area(s):

    RMG, Multinational Buying office, Trading office.

Additional Requirements

  • Age limit 35 years.

  • Must be fluent in English writing and speaking.

  • Must have advance skill on MS Excel, MS Word & MS Power Point.

Job Location

Dhaka (Uttara)

 

Salary

Negotiable

 

Compensation & Other Benefits

  1. Mobile bill

  2. Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize

  3. Salary Review: Yearly

  4. Festival Bonus: 2

  5. Performance bonus

  6. On-time salary – Current month’s salary is paid in current monthly only (last working day of each month)

  7. Health Insurance

  8. Medical Insurance

  9. Long-term benefits

  10. PF

If you are passionate to good fit for the position please send your updated CV to

career@dongyi.hk

by 14th July 2024

Note: Please Mention the Position Name in Email Subject.
